Data Sources

For an accessible version of this data, please email info@stats.govt.nz.

This app is built with data from the 2018 Census. It primarily uses the commuter view dataset, as well as aggregates from the NZ.Stat repository. The code for this website is open source on GitHub—contributions are welcome!

App not loading? Make sure you’re using the latest version of Firefox, Edge, or Chrome. If you’re still having issues, reach out on Twitter.
